tool_description: Validates and standardizes patient demographic and clinical data required for medication safety assessment.

liver_function_status.description: Liver function: normal, mild_impairment, moderate_impairment, severe_impairment

error_messages: Invalid age: Patient age must be between 0 and 150 years.
Invalid weight: Patient weight must be between 0.5 and 500 kg.
Invalid height: Patient height must be between 30 and 250 cm if provided.
Invalid gender: Use one of [male, female, other].
Invalid pregnancy status: Use one of [pregnant, not_pregnant, unknown].
Invalid liver function status: Use one of [normal, mild_impairment, moderate_impairment, severe_impairment].
Invalid creatinine: Serum creatinine must be between 0.1 and 20 mg/dL if provided.
usage: Provide required patient demographics (age, weight, gender) and optional clinical parameters. The tool validates ranges and formats data for use by other safety assessment tools.

patient_id.description: Generated patient identifier for this session

estimated_gfr.description: Estimated glomerular filtration rate if creatinine provided
